Our process

We can do almost any task you can think of. From the conception of an idea, to a fully fledged product thats shipped to thousands of users.

We are commited to find the best process to make the world a better place in the most efficient way.

This is our usual process

  • Make sure we understand each other.

    Do a Google Hangout with you and discover what your secret wishes are.

  • Gather initial data.

    Write the user stories to be as close to reality as possible.

  • Design the prototype.

    Do this in InvisionApp and collaborate on making the user experience perfect.

  • Prototype the app.

    Choose the best framework for the job and make a working prototype. Framework selection includes Ruby on Rails, Ionic, Angular.js, Meteor.js, React.js.

  • Do callaborated testing.

    Improve the design on your feedback and lock it up with tests.

  • Add metrics.

    Track every step of the user for easier future decision making. Use Segment.com and Mixpanel.

  • Ship it.

    Select the best hosting solution for the job. Choose between Heroku and a VPS.

  • Analyze

    Use the data from metrics to improve the designs and get the last percents of the conversion rate.

Enough, enough. Let's start hitting it hard together
